channel.title: Microsoft Store closes auto?
channel.description:
Just as title says the store closes automatically for whatever reason. Can't seem to figure out why. I am currently doing a sfc scan and will post results once that is done. Beyond that I have no idea what to do . To my knowledge I have all registry permissions/folder permissions for applications.
Edit: this is a legit windows 8.1 license

item.title: Microsoft Store closes auto?
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Mine was doing that as well. I restarted my computer and it went away

Read full topic
